general.gigTitle: develop a full custom website, design and coding

sellerCard.description:
Hi, I'm Yura! 

With 4 years of experience working with clients in the USA, Ukraine, and the Czech Republic, I specialize in creating functional, visually appealing websites. My design tools include Figma and Photoshop, while my development stack features Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and SCSS. I also work with MongoDB, Supabase, and Firebase to ensure robust and scalable solutions. 

Contact me today for the expert guidance and consultation is free of cost :) Thank you

description.content:
Hurry up! Lets turn your vision into reality.


Hi, Im Yura!

I specialize in building custom web applications tailored to your business needswhether its a simple informational site, a complex e-commerce platform, or something in between. My goal is to create web apps that align with your objectives and deliver an exceptional user experience.


While Im new to Fiverr, I bring 4 years of experience working on similar web projects for clients in the USA, Czechia, and Ukraine. From portfolio websites to e-commerce platforms, successfully delivered results that meet diverse needs.


Please discuss with me before placing an order.


Technologies I can work with:

  • JavaScript, React, Firebase, Next JS
  • HTML/CSS/SCSS
  • React Bootstrap, Material UI, Tailwind CSS
  • RESTful APIs
  • MongoDB


Thanks a lot for choosing this gig to checkout. :)


Note: I can also provide a custom design.

slide.name: develop a full custom website, design and coding
develop a full custom website, design and coding
develop a full custom website, design and coding

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I don't have a UI design for my web pages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Don't worry. I am also an amazing UI/UX designer. You can ask me to design an interactive UI and UX design for your website. But it will cost you additionally.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies are you proficient in?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I offer comprehensive web development services, including frontend and backend development. I can work with a variety of technologies to deliver a product that meets your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you make web animations ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I make stunning web animations using CSS3 and js

packageList.title: 🚀 Basic Website
packageList.description: Design and develop a 3-page website using Figma & React/Next.js.

packageList.title: ✨ Advanced Website
packageList.description: Create a 5-page site with custom UI, animations, and features.

packageList.title: 💎 Full-Stack Web App
packageList.description: Build a 10-page app with UI/UX design, frontend & backend.

reviews.comment:
Yura is very collaborative, easy to work with and creative. 
I really enjoyed working with him and he was able to deliver the project in a short time:) 
wishing you all the best ;)
